#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Amazing Adventures 4 The Forgotten Dynasty_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Travel to China with Amazing Adventures! When ancient tiles turn up on the black market, rumors are spread about an unknown dynasty. Your mission is to explore China and search for clues to uncover the secret of the Forgotten Dynasty. Visit 25 exotic locations as you search for more than 2,200 hidden objects. Explore more than 100 levels and find the hidden Yin and Yang symbols to unlock 2 bonus game modes. Discover fascinating facts in your journal on another of your Amazing Adventures!
